item.title: sarahallenreed.com Site Update History
item.description: 2023 November 11, 2023 Added and changed the featured images on the Full Color Samples and Black And White Samples pages. Added an actually recent photo to the About page and cleaned up the design. Cleaned up the formatting on all text pages. To Do Add alt text to everywhere it’s not already implemented. I want to make this site as screen-reader friendly as possible. Implement Gitea to self-host my Git repos.

item.title: The Listening List
item.description: What Is The Listening List? In June of 2023, I started making a tiny thread on Mastodon about albums I was listening to in the gym and in the studio. While I tend to listen to music via Newpipe in the gym, I use mocp in the studio. It eventually hit me that I could just keep everything I listen to on MOCP saved in a folder of monthly playlists, and edit them down and put them up here.

item.title: Truckstop.Coffee Site Patch Notes
item.description: 2023 July 3, 2023 Added this update log! Formally added a bunch of features, including the Miscellany section, the Project Update Threads, and more. Added Listening List entries from when I started keeping track in mid-June, up through July 1st. Finished the first entry in How To Cook Shit Started in on two additional entries Minor CSS updates, including different colors when hovering over the menu July 4, 2023 Added post 14, the Jazz Program schedule for July.
